    Package containing classes for AzureBlobStorage.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BlobAccessConditions BlobAccessConditions.setLeaseAccessConditions(LeaseAccessConditions leaseAccessConditions)
      By setting lease access conditions, requests will fail if the provided lease does not match the active lease on the blob.
